The best part was my wife barely had any pain post surgery & was discharged in 2 days. 

Would highly recommend Dr. Soumil Trivedi for any Gynaec issues

The surgery was performed in their New Hospital which I must say is an exceptional private hospital with modern amenities & very clean with really sweet & cordial staff who go above & beyond to ensure comfort.

When he showed & explained us how the entire surgery was carried out we were in shock to see how large the fibroid actually was & how efficiently the surgery was handled by him to ensure minimal bleeding & also how they remove such a large fibroid in a bag in strips to remove laparoscopically.

My sister was very comfortable post surgery despite the surgery lasting 4 hrs plus with minimal pain & was up & about the very next day.

My sincerest appreciation for Dr. Soumil Trivedi & his Team at Dr. Trivedi‚Äôs Total Health Care for the fantastic experience. Any body with any Gynaec issues you must meet Dr. Soumil once. review:
I believed in God, then I trusted God. I believe Doctors and then I trusted our Doctor. Thankyou Dr. Soumil, Dr. Priti, Dr. Prakash, All assistant doctors and staff of Dr.Trivedi maternity nursing home during all those 730+ days of struggling time to our happiest day that of birth of our baby on üíì 25 June 2020.
Our Journey with Trivedi Nursing home began with an emergency admission of my wife. This was our first miscarriage and reasons we were just guessing. Dr.Prakash and Dr.Soumil  handled our case. We somehow came out of this sadness hoping for positive things that still can happen. Under Doctors advise after 3 months we started medicine course and done some normal tests for next pregnancy. It was found in test report that chances of pregnancy by normal  intercourse were at border. It was advised by Dr. Priti that better we try pregnancy with IUI and IVF as later the fertility rate will come down that then might have to look for doner. We crossed check with few of my company Doctors about the facts. By this time we started believing Doctors at Trivedi Nursing home. We consulted with Dr. Priti and decided this time to go ahead with IUI with still time we have looking at fertility report. Other Doctors could have directly advise to go for ivf this time as IVF is costly than IUI. Our IUI was successful and pregnancy was positive. But our mystery continued and in 6th week we had to face our 2nd miscarriage. This time it was more difficult time for me and my wife to bear this sorrow. During this time we also thought of many things and full of questions like why this thing happened and this miscarriage exactly during same time of 6th week. Even we thought should we change Doctor - we didn't say or make this feel to doctor :) but we were wrong on this thought of ours. This was a turning point when Dr. Soumil handled our case. He did all investigation with our past records and current and helped us understand medical possibilities that could be with our miscarriage. He spend over 30 minutes to help us understand and upfront we got all answers to above questions that we had. He also said that if we really looking to investigate into why this miscarriage then there are more than 52 test that we need to do and cost involved in it. Even doing all this test there are possibility that we still might not find the reason. Further he suggested that there are only 3 test(of this one was historic based on family which was not in our case)that we must do that can help us during our next pregnancy to avoid miscarriage. We now had confidence in our Doctor that we now started to TRUST and came out positively with new ray of hope future. We had undergone hysteroscopy to look if anything internally triggering miscarriage. But  histroscopy didn't had any reasons that we were looking for - it was all fine.

Now back to Dr.Priti who then decided that we must go for IVF as by now we had spend years time. We had our first ivf in June 2019 but this went unsuccessful. We needed to have our 2nd IVF and was asked by Dr.Priti to wait for a month's time. Thereafter we have family emargency took place in August and September 2019 that we had stressful period. We were advised by Dr.Priti that we wait to pass this stressful period and do ivf during normal situations - stress being important part during IUI/ivf and pregnancy. We took her advise and then went for 2nd ivf in October 2019 - This was successful. During our normal Doctor's visit in 3rd week after pregnancy it was noticed by Dr.Priti that my wife's BP was high and she referred to general physician to be consulted. This was one of critical decision in our success story and BP control medicine started. After pregnancy is positive, now the case is back in hands of Dr. Soumil. 

During 6th week my wife had spotting like in periods and we immediately rushed into Dr. Trivedi's hospital. Thankfully immediate treatment by Dr. Priti saved our miscarriage. Next day morning at 8 am Dr. Prakash on his way back from Canada directly visited hospital to see his patient i.e. us. He could have gone home and come back evening for visit as other doctors have attended the case. This concern of his shows how much he cares and values patients.

Every visit from day one till date we had with Dr. Soumil, it was none less than 30 minutes of time that he has given to us - thorough checkup with explaining situations and development in details till you understand it. This time is spend with all patients that he attends.This is very important as a patient, and family member of patient, that your doctor give you enough time and you start trusting - VALUE.

In pregnancy week of 31st, my wife was admitted for evaluation of risk due to continuously high BP. This was time of Covid19 where Mumbai was highly impacted.  Nursing and service staff at Trivedi's were continuously working in a slot  of 10-15 days and stay there itself, avoiding risk of traveling, thereby taking precautions against covid19. Only emergency cases that are absolutely needed for hospitalization were taken in. We came to know hospital was offered to convert to covid hospital, obviously as source of high income. But Dr. Prakash with all care to his patients and been speciality in maternity denied this offer - This is great, Thankyou Dr. Prakash for this wonderful decision. This makes patients like us still believe that there are Doctors who primarily work for healthcare and not to make more revenue.

Finally an emotional day arrived on 25 June 2020 when we were about to have our baby. We were excited and tensed. Whatever we were going to have whether a baby boy or baby girl, it was going to make us father and mother. We finally got a baby boy on the day which was cherishable day in our life. We really thank whole heartedly üíì again to Dr. Priti, Dr. Soumil, Dr. Prakash, Dr. Aditi, all assistant doctors, sisters and maushis for right consultation, treatment, guidance and serving us in journey for having wonderful healthy baby.

Sharing our success story so that it might be a help for other people.
                                                       -  Harshada & Prashant
